title: Joe Biden To Give Farewell Address To Nation On January 15
description: US President Joe Biden will give a televised farewell address to the nation on Wednesday, the White House said, five days before Donald Trump returns to power.
excerpt: US President Joe Biden will give a televised farewell address to the nation on Wednesday, the White House said, five days before Donald Trump returns to power.
text: US President Joe Biden will give a televised farewell address to the nation on Wednesday. Washington: US President Joe Biden will give a televised farewell address to the nation on Wednesday, the White House said, five days before Donald Trump returns to power."On Wednesday, January 15 at 8:00 pm, the President will deliver a Farewell Address to the nation from the Oval Office," the White House said in a statement on Friday.(Except for the headline, this story has not been edited by NDTV staff and is published from a syndicated feed.)
html:
US President Joe Biden will give a televised farewell address to the nation on Wednesday.

Washington:

US President Joe Biden will give a televised farewell address to the nation on Wednesday, the White House said, five days before Donald Trump returns to power.

"On Wednesday, January 15 at 8:00 pm, the President will deliver a Farewell Address to the nation from the Oval Office," the White House said in a statement on Friday.

(Except for the headline, this story has not been edited by NDTV staff and is published from a syndicated feed.)
